How pairings work: $Alt/ $ETH --> If $Alt goes up, you gain more $ETH $Alt / $BTC --> if $alt goes up, you gain more $BTC $Alt / $ETH / $BTC --> If $Alt goes up you gain more $ETH. If $ETH goes up against $BTC simultaneously, there is a multiplier on gaining more $BTC
